## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                                                             | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `for` _(required)_ | `for`     | ID of the tooltip element that this trigger is linked to. Used to open and close the specified tooltip. | `string` | `undefined` |
